title: Rupantor [DVDRIP] (A Film By Abu Sayeed).mkv
description:
Running Time: 90 Minutes
Original Language: Bangla
Subtitle: English
Country of Production: Bangladesh
Year of production: 2008
Cast: Ferdous, Jayanto Chattopadhaya, Sakiba, Habib, Shatabdi Wadut, Bikrom, Mithun, Mrinal Datta, Sahdat, Nisan, S I Hera and Suvash Datta.

Festival participation


a) International Film Festival of India, 2008
b) International Film festival of Kerala, 2008
c) Chennai International Film Festival, 2008
d) International Festival of Films on Tribal Art
and Culture' held in Bhopal, 2009

Arif, a young director, to make a film has adapted the Mahabharata episode of EklavyaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s offering of honorarium (Gurudakshina) to his Guru Dronacharya. Eklavya had to sacrifice his right thumb as Gurudakshina to Drona to uphold ArjunaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s supremacy in archery, which caused the end of EklavyaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s potential as an archer. While making the film on this mythological incident Arif is confronted with a new truth. At the shooting spot he comes to know from the Santals who gather to see the shooting that for archery the arrow needs to be held between right index and middle fingers- the thumb has no role to play in it. This revelation makes Arif and his associates extremely amazed. Deep in his heart Arif gets puzzled with the question then why did Eklavya had to pay his right thumb as Gurudakshina if it was not essential for archery? There begins ArifÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new analysis, and as a result a novel episode takes shape mingling the realism of the past with the present.
